job_details.Functieomschrijving:
To achieve this mission, we are looking for a Senior Backend Developer to join our Generative AI team.
            What you will do
            You'll be working in CM.com's Generative AI team. In our Generative AI team, you'll be working on providing a state-of-the-art centralized platform around generative AI to CM.com customers where they can manage and control their generative AI powered assistants. Our Generative AI team focusses on providing functionality and control around Large Language Models in combination with traditional NLP concepts to fully service our customers' use-cases.
            As a Back-End Engineer, you will play a crucial role in ensuring the scalability and reliability of our existing platform while collaborating closely with the team to design and implement cutting-edge solutions. You will integrate AI capabilities developed by our data scientists and ML engineers with traditional software engineering practices to build innovative products that are either customer-facing or integrated across the broader CM.com platform and product portfolio.
            The core product currently consists of:
            · A custom-built CMS customers can use to easily manage the data in their knowledge base, synchronize their knowledge base with external systems while also preparing the data for our inference engine.
            · A custom-built inference engine that's able to process any question/instruction from the end-user providing fully customizable, autonomous AI agents across multiple domains (customer service, marketing, internal automation…).
job_details.full_text:
Backend Developer

To achieve this mission, we are looking for a Senior Backend Developer to join our Generative AI team.
            What you will do
            You'll be working in CM.com's Generative AI team. In our Generative AI team, you'll be working on providing a state-of-the-art centralized platform around generative AI to CM.com customers where they can manage and control their generative AI powered assistants. Our Generative AI team focusses on providing functionality and control around Large Language Models in combination with traditional NLP concepts to fully service our customers' use-cases.
            As a Back-End Engineer, you will play a crucial role in ensuring the scalability and reliability of our existing platform while collaborating closely with the team to design and implement cutting-edge solutions. You will integrate AI capabilities developed by our data scientists and ML engineers with traditional software engineering practices to build innovative products that are either customer-facing or integrated across the broader CM.com platform and product portfolio.
            The core product currently consists of:
            · A custom-built CMS customers can use to easily manage the data in their knowledge base, synchronize their knowledge base with external systems while also preparing the data for our inference engine.
            · A custom-built inference engine that's able to process any question/instruction from the end-user providing fully customizable, autonomous AI agents across multiple domains (customer service, marketing, internal automation…).

profile_classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes working with Large Language Models (LLMs) and generative AI, building a platform for managing AI-powered assistants, and integrating AI capabilities into customer-facing products. This aligns strongly with the definition and core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer, particularly in developing and deploying systems around generative models and building production-grade software.

job_tasks.justification: The role involves 'design and implement cutting-edge solutions', 'integrate AI capabilities...with traditional software engineering practices to build innovative products', and mentions 'customer-facing' applications and 'backend engineer' responsibilities, all indicative of software development.
The role explicitly states 'Backend Developer' and 'Back-End Engineer', focusing on 'scalability and reliability of our existing platform' and integrating AI into products.
The job involves working with 'generative AI', 'Large Language Models', and 'inference engine' which are core to generative AI modeling.
The role focuses on 'Large Language Models' and their application in AI-powered assistants and agents.
The description mentions managing data in a knowledge base, synchronizing it with external systems, and preparing data for an inference engine, which are data engineering tasks.
job_tasks.phrase: manage the data in their knowledge base, synchronize their knowledge base with external systems while also preparing the data for our inference engine

job_tasks.justification: The role involves building and maintaining a 'centralized platform around generative AI' and 'custom-built inference engine', which are software development tasks for AI products.
The role involves working with 'autonomous AI agents' which are a key application of generative AI and LLMs.
The role is part of a 'Generative AI team' focused on providing solutions for 'CM.com customers' and servicing 'customers' use-cases', indicating alignment with business goals and customer needs.
